description: A widow of 3 sons one living w/ me. Am a Christian Pentecostal searching for friendship or possible serious relationship or marriage with a man who is also a Christian to be my companion for life. Am a loving, humble, optimistic, and down-to-earth ...I am a woman of integrity and of good heart...simple but dependable, sincere and trustworthy...i am not here for fun but looking for a long-lasting relationship with a man who is trustworthy, honest and optimistic like me, i love inspiring people, keeping them smile...i am a woman whom u can lean on when u are down...If you are interested to know more about me u can email me...i can't answer your message here bec i am not yet upgraded...thank u and God bless!
